author: @WHSVnews
title: Preparing your garden for Spring
text:
Updated: 3 hours ago
WAYNESBORO, Va. (WHSV) - The City of Waynesboro is working to acquire private land required to connect the South River Greenway with a nearby park, but the effort has run into complications for the city.
Updated: 3 hours ago
HARRISONBURG, Va. (WHSV) - Like every other appliance in a home, natural gas appliances and lines are at risk during severe weather, but protection steps can be taken to secure them during harsh weather.
Updated: 3 hours ago
STAUNTON, Va. (WHSV) - The Staunton City School Board voted to hire the national search firm BWP and Associates to lead the search for Staunton City Schools’ next superintendent.
Updated: 3 hours ago
WAYNESBORO, Va. (WHSV) - The Waynesboro Police Department arrested Robert Levi Joiner, 60, of Waynesboro for one count of knowingly possessing child pornography in addition to 24 charges for subsequent offenses.
Updated: 3 hours ago
GREENVILLE, Va. (WHSV) - An absconded probationer is now in custody after a search Wednesday afternoon that involved personnel from the Augusta County Sheriff’s Office, Virginia State Police and Virginia Department of Corrections, according to the ACSO.
